resources:
Black Star Pastry Black Star Pastry logoImage Strawberry Watermelon Cake cakeImage Strawberry Watermelon Cake is the most famous dessert in Black Star Pastry, which never fails to impress. 

It consists of two layers of almond dacquoise (like a meringue), rose-scented cream, watermelon, strawberries and garnished with pistachios and dried rose petals. rose-scented cream, watermelon, strawberries and garnished with pistachios and dried rose petals. Contact Phone: (02) 9557 8656 Address: 277 Australia St, Newtown NSW Open Hours:
7am - 5pm Sunday -Wednesday
7am - 5:30pm Thursday - Saturday
